did.abstract: Member of Co. D, 339th U.S. Infantry who served in the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition." Collection includes transcript of his diary describing his experiences in Russia.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
